Not sure if it belongs here, but I couldn't find a bug report section.

Currently (in 1.02) when hitting ESC and choosing "Save Game", the following dialog maps the Enter key to "Cancel". So if you hit Enter to save, it will actually NOT save.

Now this sounds like a minor thing, but this is actually a critical issue. Hitting that key is always mapped to actually save in all games and programs, and no one will go check and/or notice that it was not saved. I and (according to Reddit & co) many other people have lost countless hours of progress to this issue, ending in frustration and possibly abandoning the game all together, because of a simple miss-mapping.

It would be great if you could prioritize that issue in your bug-list.

[MOD - Moved to Support (unmodded installs) subforums.

We also have another subforum dedicated to modded installs.]
